The Annexation of Switzerland: After fierce fighting in the Alpine Mountains, we have conquered and annexed Switzerland. The Swiss army has surrendered, and the territory is under our control, but the people are still resistant.
After a long fight with the Bulgarian Empire, we have launched a full offensive and forced the Bulgarian Army to surrender. Sofia is now in our hands!
The Iron Guard has been extinguished and Romania has been annexed. We no longer have to worry about them.
We're greeted as liberators, thats what we intend to do!
The Serbian State has been annexed, our troops are parading in Belgrade. A major threat to the stability in the region has been removed.
The Greek Peninsula has been secured and Greece has been annexed. Fate of the entire greek nation lies in our hands....

In 1848 the Frankfurt Assembly debated the fate of the German states. In 1871 Bismarck forged a united Germany. In 1914 we smashed the Entente. And now we have finally liberated our last German brothers from the clutches of decadency! Long live Grossdeutschland!
The Croats are now taking their orders from us, the way things should be. There is some resistance among them, but it will be crushed under our heels!
Our soldiers are marching through the streets of Warsaw after the Polish army surrendered early yesterday afternoon.

All across the old Swiss Confederation, the French-, German- and Italian-speaking cantons are starting to experience small-scale revolts against our garrisons. Granting independence to the Swiss would appease this dissent, while also guaranteeing another valuable member into our alliance. Some right-wing politicians, however, propose a complete dissolution of the old Confederation, annexing the German-speaking areas to the Reich - or maybe even a partition of Switzerland with France and Italy.

The French have accepted our offer for the partition of Switzerland. We will now transfer sovereignity of the French-speaking cantons to them.

Following the war against the Hatsemite Arabia, we are now under control of several lands once held by that arabic state. What shall we do with them now? We could try and establish direct control it as a new province, or even setup a new independent republic in Nedj, albeit under a friendly government.
Directly integrate Arabia into our empire !

By the grace and wisdom of God, we have played our part in the destruction of the heathen Commune of France and we ended in possesion of parts of France ! How shall we administer captured french territory ?
National France can have that land, if they join us!
Actually, we'll keep these for ourselves!

Our skepticism in joining the Mediterrenean Bloc may have been wrong !  They have somehow not only defeated the Commune of France, but are now offering us a second chance in joining their cause, while we regain the French mainland!  This is a wonderful opportunity to be a major power in the world again!  Should we accept such an offer ?

As we predicted, this offer was just too good for the Algerian government to refuse.  With their acceptance the Medditeraenean block has gained an important member which will allow us to better defend our interests in Europe !
Choosing the new Head of State of Occitania
We have the opportunity to install a member of the house of Bourbon-Parma as the new Grand Duke of Occitania. However, it may be wise to let the Occitans choose their own government.
Prince Rene of Bourbon-Parma will be new Grand Duke!
Let the Occitans decide, as long as they stay loyal.
Carlist Spain has imposed Prince Rene of Bourbon-Parma as the new Grand Duke of Occitania. There's nothing we can do, we have to fold and become a Grand Duchy.
Choosing the new Head of State of France
We have the opportunity to install a member of the house of Bourbon-Parma as the new king of France. However, it may be wise to let the Occitans choose their own government.
Prince Rene of Bourbon-Parma will be new King!
Let the Occitans decide, as long as they stay loyal.
Carlist Spain has imposed Prince Rene of Bourbon-Parma as the new King of France. There's nothing we can do, we have to fold and become a Kingdom.
The areas of the former Western Circassia are now firmly integrated into our growing republic.
The areas of the former Kingdom of Abkhazia are now firmly integrated into our growing republic.
After a long fight with the Arabians, we have launched a full offensive and forced the Arabian Army to surrender. Riyhad is now in our hands!
After a long fight with the Libyians, we have launched a full offensive and forced the Libyian Army to surrender. Tripoli is now in our hands!
After a long fight with the Egyptians, we have launched a full offensive and forced the Egyptian Army to surrender. Cairo is now in our hands!
After a long fight with the Persians, we have launched a full offensive and forced the Persian Army to surrender. Teheran is now in our hands!
After a long fight with the Tunisians, we have launched a full offensive and forced the Tunisian Army to surrender. Tunis is now in our hands!
After a long fight with the Tunisians, we have launched a full offensive and forced the Tunisian Army to surrender. Tunis is now in our hands!
After a long fight with the Yemenites, we have launched a full offensive and forced the Yemenite Army to surrender. Sana'a is now in our hands!
After a long fight with the Omani, we have launched a full offensive and forced the Omani Army to surrender. Muscat is now in our hands!
After fierce fighting in the Caucasus, we have conquered and annexed Armenia. The Armenian army has surrendered, and the territory is under our control, but the people are still resistant.

After fierce fighting in the Caucasus, we have conquered and annexed Armenia. The Armenian army has surrendered, and the territory is under our control, but the people are still resistant but soon they will submit.
After fierce fighting in the Caucasus, we have conquered and annexed Azerbaijan. The Azeri army has surrendered, and the territory is under our control, but the people are still resistant.
Liberate Azerbaijan and install a friendly government!

After fierce fighting in the Caucasus, we have conquered and annexed Azerbaijan. The Azeri army has surrendered, and the territory is under our control, but the people are still resistant but soon they will submit

Following our campaigns in the Indian subcontinent, we are now controlling several territories of the former states of that region. Local leaders, and also our own politicians, are petitioning for autonomy for those areas.
Restore our friends of the Delhi government to power!
Liberate the good socialists of the Bhartiya Commune!
Liberate the nationally conscious Indian Union!
After a long fight with the Afghans, we have launched a full offensive and forced the Afghan Army to surrender. Kabul is now in our hands!
We have taken control over Cuba and secured American hegemony throughout the Carribean. What should we do with the 'liberated' island?

We have taken control over the Thai state and secured our dominance on the upper part of the Malay Peninsular. Now the pressing issue for our government is figuring out what we should do with the newly 'liberated' Thai provinces.
We have managed to drive the Germans from the island of Ceylon and secured the capital of Colombo thoroughly. Now, however, we need to figure out what to do with the damned rock.
Ceylon was once part of the Raj - it shall be so again!

We have destroyed the last remnants of the Turkish state and finally put the 'sick man of Europe' in his grave. Our troops patrol the streets of Ankara and the ancient city of Constantinople, however, we can't remain as occupiers for ever. A decision will have to be made in regards to the future government of the Turkish people.
Allow the formation of a new Turkish Republic!
Partition Anatolia between a Kurdish and a Turkish state!
Restore the Ottoman sultan to his throne!
We have conquered the fertile lands of the Levant including the grand and ancient cities of Jerusalem, Damascus and Baghdad. What are we to do with these old Ottoman provinces?
Create a single Great Syrian state!
Partition the old vilayets between Syria and Iraq!
Merge the Mesopotamian vilayets into an Iraqi state!
Birth of the Greater Syrian State

The ancient heartland of the Czechs have been conquered by our victorious forces. The venerable gem of the Danube, Prague, is occupied by our troops who parade smartly across the Charles Bridge. Should we prop up a Czech government loyal to the designs of our own state or maintain this splendid military occupation?
Liberate a Kingdom of Czechs and Moravs!
Liberate a Kingdom of Czechs, Moravs and Slovaks!
What a day for all Czechs! Time for beer and cabbage!
The Union of Bohemia, Moravia and Slovakia
What a day for all Czechs and Slovaks!
A King for the Throne in Prague
With the Czech heartland now duly ruled by a loyal kingdom, we have the opportunity to influence which princeling should succeed to the throne in Prague.
Grand Duke Roman Petrovitch shall be Ottokar III!
Prince Franz of Bavaria shall be Zikmund II!
The Sudeten Felix zu Schwarzenberg will be Karel VII!
The native Zdenek Sternberk will be Vaclav V
Long live His Majesty Ottokar III!
Long live His Majesty Zikmund II!
Long live His Majesty Karel VII!
Long live His Majesty Vaclav V!
We shan't have any monarchs after all!
Our glorious army has successfully reconquered southern Macedonia, which we lost to Bulgaria after the Weltkrieg. The entire nation rejoices as proper Greek territory returns to us.
Our armed forces have succesfully regained control over the island of Kefalonia, which was lost to Austria-Hungary after our defeat in the Weltkrieg.
Our combined naval and ground forces have gained control over the chain of islands in the Aegean Sea, which were occupied by the decadent Ottoman Empire since the end of the Weltkrieg.
The Aegean Sea belongs to the Greeks!
Our combined naval and ground forces have gained control over Crete, which our proud nation was forced to cede to the hungry German Empire after our defeat in the Weltkrieg.
Territories which our proud nation was forced to cede during the first and second partition of Poland to the Kingdom of Prussia have been regained.
A great day for the fatherland
Our ground forces have successfully regained control over provinces we were forced to cede to the Russian Empire after the third partition of Poland.
A great day for the fatherland
Our ground forces have succesfully regained control over provinces we were forced to cede to the Russian Empire after the third partition of Poland.
A great day for the fatherland
Territories which our proud nation was forced to cede during the first partition of Poland to the Habsburg Monarchy have been regained.
The Spanish People Accept Carlist Rule
The Spanish people have adjusted to us as expected, and we no longer face partisans except for in the major labour areas and in the wild and untamed forests.
The Spanish People Accept Syndicalist Rule

The Trade Unions control all of Spain and the people now accept it. There are still Reactionaries hiding in the forests and the mountains, fighting against Syndicalist rule but they will soon learn better.

Our Kaiser Wilhelm II has died of a pulmonary embolism in a hospital in Berlin. It is the end of an Age. The Empire must now look towards Friedrich Wilhelm to guide us through the coming troubled times.
The Kaiser is dead! Long live Kaiser Wilhelm III!
Our Kaiser Wilhelm II has died of a pulmonary embolism in a hospital in Berlin. It is the end of an Age. The Empire must now look towards Friedrich Wilhelm to guide us through the second Weltkrieg!
The Kaiser is dead! Long live Kaiser Wilhelm III!
Alamut - newest book of Vladimir Bartol

Slovene people are stubborn people. After so much years of Germanization they still use their funny language! They are resisting our cultural machine! The newest book in the Slovene speaking territories, Bartol, is a story of Turkish and Persian struggles to control the fortress of Alamut. The action is set in the 11th century, when Seljuk Turks started expanding into Asia Minor. It is suspected that the book will be translated into German and many more languages soon.
Diary of a Country Priest - newest book of Georges Benanos
Claude Lévi-Strauss - what to do with him?
Throw him into jail, this time forever!
Let him go, he won't do anything against us!
Famous socialist antrophologist Lévi-Strauss is free from militaristic French tyranny. We should invite him so he can praise our great socialist government!
We don't need individuals, we are collective!
One of the greatest minds of this century decided to live in the Commune of France. We shall hail him!
Lévi-Strauss flees to Commune of France!
This foul rat, Lévi-Strauss decided to flee to the Commune of France! We could've imprisoned him, the world would've been better with one less Marxist.
Lévi-Strauss does not want to live in our socialist paradise!
Lévi-Strauss refused our invitation as he says that we are a corrupted version of Marxism mixed with the worst authoritarian government.
We will show him who is truly Marxist!
Lévi-Strauss decides to live in Russia

Lévi-Strauss decided to come to Russia. He said in an interview that he enjoys the Russian democracy established by Kerensky and defended by the Great White Generals and he wishes to stay forever, not going back unless France will democratize.
Lévi-Strauss decides to live in the United States of America
Lévi-Strauss decided to come to the USA. He said in an interview that he enjoys the long tradition of American democracy and he wishes to stay forever, not going back unless France will democratize.
Sartre explains his philosophical stance in his newest book!

In his newest book, Existentialism as a Humanism, Sartre explains the doctrine of Existentialism. For him one of the key points is that the existence of a person comes before his or her essence. In simple terms, this means that, although that person exists, there is nothing to dictate that person's character, goals in life, and so on. Only the person themselves can define their essence.
Great, however I don't understand this
Sartre has written a book about the war in Algieria

Just when Socialist troops entered Algiers, the capitol of National France, Sartre published his views on liberating the natives of former French colonies. In the book he genuinely says that the pied noirs should come back to mainland France and leave Algieria for the Algierians who are second class citizens in their own homeland. This book is extremely popular and it seems that the government will distribute it to commissars.

All Stockholm citizens have followed the Olympics, either via radio, newspaper, or in the stadiums. There will be over four thousand athletes, most of them men, from nearly every European country except the Syndicalist ones and from other continents too. The atmosphere is poisoned with nationalism, manifesting in unhealthy rooting for the national teams and a hostile atmosphere between teams. Every Swede is proud of his nation hosting the Olympics in Stockholm.
We can't wait for the main events
Jesse Owens wins two gold medals!

Great news from the Olympics - Jesse Owens won two golden medals, one at the two hundred meters, second on the long jump. Americans, especially Afroamericans have delighted over his success. It is a ray of hope in these dark times.
At least we are winning at something
Italian team wins gold medal at football
After long ninety minutes of fighting with La Plata, Italian Federation has won a gold in football. It is great time for us!
We rule at stadiums, we shall rule in Neapoli!
La Platian Team Wins Football Gold Medal
After long ninety minutes of fighting with team from the Italian Federation, La Plata has won a gold in football. It is great time for us!
Japanese swimmers have won five gold medals, three silver, and five bronze medals which makes Japan first in swimming. Japanese swimmers are true sons of the Empire.
We can be proud of them
Polish Female Athletes Win Five Medals!
It seems that our small kingdom, has managed to win five medals in women's athletic competitions. It is a great success for such a small nation.
They represent the pride of Poland indeed!
Today, the Olympics have ended. The Mayor and Stockholm bureaucrats have done a lot of good work in administrating the city and preparing the Olympics. The world has a more favorable view of Sweden.

The Annexation of Switzerland: A UFO! Wait, it's the KLOTW Mod Team!
Well, now you've done it. I hope you enjoyed your game, cause you won't last much longer! You've unleashed the KLOTW mod team. What did you think of Kaiserreich? Great Mod, or Greatest Mod?
We now control the whole Italian peninsula and have won the support of all of its people.
We now control the whole Italian peninsula and have won the support of all of its people.

A successful revolution in the Italian Federation led to democratic elections which the right-wing conservatives failed to win. Perhaps we can approach the new government and convince them to join our country? A new Risorgimento could be achieved through peaceful negotiations!
No, they are not worth it!

The Socialist Republic of Italy approached us and, together with the congratulations for the new government, they asked if we want to become a part of their country. They think that we can achieve a peaceful unification through negotiations. What should we answer?
Accept, for a new united Italy!
No, we will never be ruled by you!

Accept, for a new united Italy!
No, we will never be ruled by you!

No, we will never be ruled by you!

The stupid politicians in the Italian Federation refused to accept our proposal. What should we do now?
